title.narrative: Supporting the development and impact of environmental, social and governance regulations through engagement with Chinese listed companies

description.narrative: The project is designed to draw on UK expertise to raise awareness and capacity on climate reporting amongst the top 100 Chinese companies; assist the China Securities Regulatory Commission to accelerate its regulation on environmental, social and governance; and mainstream corporate climate change reporting in China.
